mapper.insert: insert into com_bank_acct (splitkey, acct_no, cust_no, deposit_acct, acct_name, sub_acct, card_brch_code, card_subbrch_code, unioncode, sell_code, reg_brch_code, reg_subbrch_code, reg_sellcode, open_busin, service, cust_manager, fm_manager, acct_status, insert_date, modi_date, summary, deposit_book, deliver_type, deliver_way, card_level, sign_status, trans_method, bank_cust_code, relevant_prod, protocol_no, ledger_flag, elc_flag) values (#{splitkey, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acctNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{custNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{depositAcct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subAcct, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardBrchCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardSubbrchCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unioncode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regBrchCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regSubbrchCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regSellcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openBusin, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custManager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmManager, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acctStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insertDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modiDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depositBook, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverWay, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCustCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relevantProd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{protocolNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ledgerFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{elcFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
